title: RUN FOR THE WALL

content: Is there a ride for the wall, I could ride my bike... Me run? no, walk? OK, Hike? OK, If I don't carry too much and stops for breaks more often, but I ain't runnin nowhere. I can do a lot of miles on my mountain bike without tearing up my knees and ankles. I took off yesterday when the sun popped out and did about twelve miles, lotta hills. Quantum materiae materietur marmota monax si marmota monax materiam possit materiari?

content: I would if I could, but I can't! I can't even walk straight, I walk like a drunk! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
